ControlBlock.Description: Limitation of rising and falling rate. Function of Enable: 0: rate limiting disabled, signal is passed through 1: rate limiting enabled, signal is rate limited 0->1: preload of output with value from init input

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at rising flanke of enable signal.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to In. Enable != 0: Activation of block; Out is rate limited. Enable 0->1: Preloading of output; Out is set to value of Init input.

MaskParameter.Name: Tr
MaskParameter.Description: Rising time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tr.

MaskParameter.Name: Tf
MaskParameter.Description: Falling time in seconds. Slew rate will be 1/Tf.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: out_old
ImplementationParameter.Description: Output value from last cycle in int32 format.

ControlBlock.Author: sfragner

MaskInport.Name: Init
MaskInport.Description: Value which is loaded at initialization function call.

MaskInport.Name: Enable
MaskInport.Description: Enable == 0: Deactivation of block; Out is set to 0. Enable 0->1: Preload of integral part. Enable == 1: Activation of block.

MaskParameter.Name: ts_fact
MaskParameter.Description: Multiplication factor of base sampling time (in integer format).

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0

ImplementationParameter.Name: sfr
ImplementationParameter.Description: Shift factor for I coefficient b0
